Casino scene??? What was the point? And HOW did they not have Lando as the code breaker??  Lando would've been perfect. And NO Lightsaber on Lightsaber fight? WHY???? What is going on? There's so much more. How is Leia still alive\, or WHY is she alive? So disappointed.
